amendment.description: To improve title I by including information about assessments in the categories of information that parents have a right to know about.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2225 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2225 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Bennet to Amendment SA 2089. (consideration: CR S5094-5097; text: CR S5097) To improve title I by including information about assessments in the categories of information that parents have a right to know about.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2225 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2225 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Bennet to Amendment SA 2089.
